title: I hope everyone is enjoying Legends of Runeterra?
body:
Because I'm sitting here... 

looking at my Mac..... 

with its error screen.......  

wondering how many puppies I must have killed in a past life to deserve this discrimination.......

{{sticker:sg-soraka}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}} 


I hope you guys are having fun at least.

replies.body: It's still only the beta :) It'll come to Mac with the full release I imagine, maybe even before it leaves beta.

I hope so! ^_^
Save me a spot! 

Anyway, how is it?  Does it live up?

I'll be honest, been playing mostly Sea of Thieves with some mates lately, but what I have played of LoR I have thoroughly enjoyed.

I don't know if it could take the place of Beta Gwent for me enjoyment-wise, but it's certainly close, and visually it's fantastic.

Ahhh okay, my friend has nothing but praise for it so far too.

It is nice that they can fill out the League universe with good games like this and TFT.  It's very wholesome.  
Nice to hear it's not just a tacked on extra to league!
